Articles.Content:
Been playing for a couple weeks now, and am having a blast!!! Got drawn in by the trailer videos on Steam and gave the trial a try, but was captured and had to buy it!

Kudos and am looking forward to more (and better) content as RTM gets closer!!!

Welcome to the forums!

Glad to hear that you've been enjoying the game so far. If you have any questions about what you're doing, feel free to ask questions and look at tutorials. Don't be afraid to jump into any other discussions that are going on as well.
